articles.title: 10 Best Boxing Anime, Ranked
articles.author: Daniel Kurland
articles.excerpt: Sports anime have always been popular, and boxing series like Megalobox and Rokudenashi Blues rank among the best.
articles.summary:
Anime
 has the incredible ability to tackle the impossible where nothing is off limits, whether it's fantastical adventures, giant robot mayhem, or even a deconstruction of popular sports and recreational pastimes. Anime embraces every sport imaginable, no matter how niche, but there's been a surprising amount of series that explore the highs and lows of boxing.
 
Boxing is in the middle of a cinematic renaissance after movies like 
Creed III, Big George Foreman
, and 
Prizefighter
. Anime has respected this demanding activity for decades and it's fascinating to look back on the medium's diverse history with the sport, as well as which boxing anime deserve to be crowned heavyweight champions.

articles.title: The Black Clover movie may have set back the anime's return
articles.author: Joseph Brogan
articles.excerpt: One of the most highly anticipated anime projects of the year was finally released this past weekend in the form of the Black Clover movie.
articles.summary:
One of the most highly anticipated anime projects of the year was finally released this past weekend in the form of the Black Clover movie. Following the delay from its original release date of March 1, 202, fans have been excitedly counting down the months, weeks, and days until its eventual Friday, June 16, 202 release.

With the film now available to watch on Netflix worldwide, fans of the series are tuning in to experience the events and assess the franchise's return to an anime format. Unsurprisingly, the Black Clover movie has received high praise from long-time fans and newcomers alike for its overall quality.

articles.title: My Love Story with Yamada-kun at Lv999 Season 2: Exploring the possibilities of the anime's renewal
articles.author: Koyel Sardar
articles.excerpt: My Love Story with Yamada-kun at Lv999 quickly became a comfort anime show for fans during the spring season.
articles.summary:
My Love Story with Yamada-kun at Lv999 quickly became a comfort anime show for fans during the spring season. With its adorable characters and the perfect blend of romance and comedy, the series captivated the hearts of countless viewers since its debut on April 2, 2023. Scheduled to have had a 13-episode run, the anime recently concluded its airing on June 24.

With the positive reviews it garnered, the burning question on everyone's mind is whether or not there will be a second season of My Love Story with Yamada-kun at Lv999.

articles.title: 5 most popular Pokemon characters of all time
articles.author: Lukus Herblet
articles.excerpt: The Pokemon franchise is home to some of the best creatures in all fiction and holds fascinating characters throughout each facet of the series.
articles.summary:
The Pokemon franchise is home to some of the best creatures in all fiction and holds fascinating characters throughout each facet of the series. Having a vast collection of beloved characters, there are bound to be a few that stick in the hearts of fans more than others. Not every recognizable character will be from the anime or games. Thanks to the various ways fans can enjoy the franchise, no one's experience or favorite character is ever the same.



5) Red

Though on the outside, Red and Ash seem to be very similar characters, this could not be further from the truth.

Sin embargo, aunque es excelente y cuenta con más de 100 millones de usuarios registrados en todo el mundo, puede que no sea perfecta para todos.


Sin lugar a dudas, 
Crunchyroll es una de las mejores opciones para los fanáticos del anime
, pero no todos pueden disfrutar de su contenido.

articles.author: Nick Valdez
articles.excerpt: The Ancient Magus' Bride was one of the many anime franchises airing its new episodes this past [...]
articles.summary: The Ancient Magus' Bride was one of the many anime franchises airing its new episodes this past Spring 2023 anime schedule, and fans have gotten the first look at the second half of the season with a new trailer for The Ancient Magus' Bride Season 2 Part 2 coming later this year! Fans had been waiting quite a while for the anime taking on Kore Yamazaki's original The Ancient Magus' Bride manga to return with a proper Season 2, and the College Arc of the series finally kicked off as part of the Spring 2023 anime schedule.

articles.title: MAPPA's silence on Yuri!!! on Ice movie has started to irk fans
articles.author: Gokul Chettiyar
articles.excerpt: MAPPA's Yuri!!! on Ice was one of the most successful anime of 2016. Two years after its release, the anime announced a movie for the same that was slated to be released in 2020.
articles.summary:
MAPPA's Yuri!!! on Ice was one of the most successful anime of 2016. Two years after its release, the anime announced a movie for the same that was slated to be released in 2020. However, due to the COVID-19 pandemic, the production was delayed to the point that the movie hasn't been released even three years after its actual release window.

Following that, the film's official website put up a notice stating their apologies for not having released the movie yet. As per the website, the film is still under production and is at a stage where announcing a release date is difficult.

articles.title: This Honkai Star Rail Anime Opening Proves We Need a Show ASAP
articles.author: Megan Peters
articles.excerpt: Earlier this year, the Hoyoverse expanded in a big way when Honkai: Star Rail went live. The game [...]
articles.summary:
Earlier this year, the Hoyoverse expanded in a big way when Honkai: Star Rail went live. The game has gone on to receive solid reviews from fans as a number of Genshin Impact players were drawn into the sci-fi game. Of course, Honkai's anime art style brought in its own set of fans, and now one creator has given the game an anime opening that proves we need a full-blown series.

As you can see above, the YouTube page Okabenshin shared the opening in collaboration with Seventh Saturday 77. The pair decided to give Honkai: Star Rail an anime opening akin to something you would see from a mech series.

articles.author: Namrata Ghosh
articles.excerpt: The light novel series The Banished Former Hero Lives as He Pleases is set to receive an anime adaptation, as announced recently on its official website and via a Twitter post.
articles.summary:
The light novel series The Banished Former Hero Lives as He Pleases is set to receive an anime adaptation, as announced recently on its official website and via a Twitter post. Set in a world where adults receive powerful "gifts" from God, the story follows Allen, who is exiled for not having a gift. But unknown to all, he has a powerful past laced with mystery.

The fantasy light novel series, written by Shin Kozuki and illustrated by Chocoan, was initially published as a web novel series from January 2018 to June 2019.

articles.title: This Canceled Anime Got a Second Seasons Thanks to Toonami
articles.author: Kevin T. Rodriguez
articles.excerpt: There was an anime in Japan that was a flop. In America, it was successful enough for Cartoon Network to order a second season.
articles.summary:
Cartoon Network's 
Toonami block
 is not only the block that helped make anime mainstream, it is also the block known for bringing back canceled anime. After re-runs of 
Dragon Ball Z
 became a hit, Toonami reversed their decision to not fund new productions and hired Funimation to produce more English episodes of the hit series. After the final 17 episodes of the DiC Productions dub of 
Sailor Moon
 aired, Cartoon Network paid to have 
Sailor Moon S
 and 
Sailor Moon SuperS
 dubbed (though it was decided it was in everyone's best interest to not dub the final season, 
Sailor Stars
).

articles.title: Ranking of Kings anime announces first-ever movie adaptation
articles.author: Namrata Ghosh
articles.excerpt: A new movie for the anime Ranking of Kings has been announced recently and is to begin production very soon.
articles.summary:
A new movie for the anime Ranking of Kings has been announced recently and is to begin production very soon. Fans have expressed their excitement about hopefully seeing Bojji, the protagonist of the original anime series, back on screen. A spin-off series, The Treasure Chest of Courage, has recently drawn its curtain, featuring a whole new story not connected to the original anime.

Ranking of Kings is an ongoing shonen manga written and illustrated by Sōsuke Tōka, which began serializing on May 20, 2017, on the Manga Hack website.

articles.title: 10 Best Anime Video Games, Ranked
articles.author: Daniel Kurland
articles.excerpt: Action-packed series like One Piece and Gundam make for amazing video game adaptations that are surprisingly fun.
articles.summary:
Over time, it's become increasingly common for 
anime
 to adapt the generation's most popular games into animated series. However, it's just as common for the top anime to receive video game counterparts that allow audiences to control their favorite characters and recreate iconic scenes from anime classics.
 
There are hundreds of anime video games, but there is a much smaller percentage of titles that are actually good and faithfully adapt their respective anime. It's taken a long time for anime video games to work out their issues, but audiences now have plenty of options for exceptional anime video game experiences.

articles.title: The Banished Former Hero Lives as He Pleases anime adaptation confirmed
articles.author: Joseph Brogan
articles.excerpt: Tuesday, June 20, 2023, saw a website open to announce the television anime adaptation of The Banished Former Hero Lives as He Pleases light novel series.
articles.summary:
Tuesday, June , 23, saw a website open to announce the television anime adaptation of The Banished Former Hero Lives as He Pleases light novel series. The original light novel series, written by Shin Kozuki and illustrated by Chocoan, was first published as a web novel on the Shosetsuka ni Naro website from January 18 to June 19.

While fans weren't expecting the anime adaptation announcement, many fans of the original The Banished Former Hero Lives as He Pleases light novel series are showing out in its wake.

articles.title: 10 Weirdest Isekai Worlds In Anime
articles.author: Angelo Delos Trinos
articles.excerpt: Anime like Konosuba and Isekai Quartet have some of the weirdest isekai realms in all of anime.
articles.summary:
Isekai 
anime
 are so ubiquitous that their formula is known by almost everyone, including viewers who may not be fans of the genre. Almost every modern isekai anime is set in a fantasy world that conveniently resembles an RPG that the hero (and viewers) played before. However, that doesn't mean there's room for weirdness and variety.
 
Some isekai anime bucked their genre's trends by transporting their characters into the most unexpected and oddly specific worlds. A few of these worlds felt like they came from another genre, while others were deceptively familiar fantasies.

articles.title: From Screen to Shelf: Exploring the World of Anime Figures
articles.author: Feroz Ali
articles.excerpt: Introduction Anime has the incredible ability to captivate us with its immersive storytelling, vibrant characters, and visually stunning animation. For many fans, the love for anime extends beyond the…
articles.summary:
Introduction


Anime has the incredible ability to captivate us with its immersive storytelling, vibrant characters, and visually stunning animation. For many fans, the love for anime extends beyond the screen and into the realm of collecting anime figures. These intricately crafted pieces of art allow us to bring our favorite characters to life and create a tangible connection to the anime worlds we adore. In this article, we will embark on a journey into the world of 
Anime Figures
, exploring their appeal, the joy of collecting, and the ways in which they bridge the gap between the screen and our shelves.

articles.title: Peek into the Clover Kingdom at the Black Clover M Anime Expo booth
articles.author: Daz Skubich
articles.excerpt: The Black Clover M Anime Expo booth looks jam-packed with awesome activities and set pieces from the upcoming game, plus a hands-on demo to try.
articles.summary:
Garena and VIC Games Studio are bringing the world of 
Black Clover M: Rise of the Wizard King
 to Los Angeles with the announcement of the 
Black Clover M Anime Expo
 booth. You can expect photo ops, activities, and a hands-on demo of what could be one of the 
best anime games
 of the year. 
 
The studios aim to create a small slice of the Clover Kingdom in the Los Angeles Convention Center to transport Black Clover fans to iconic locations from the anime and the upcoming game. The main draw is the chance to play the Black Clover M demo before the general public and win prizes at the same time, including Black Clover character screen cleaners and pop sockets for your phone.

articles.title: The Latest Updates on the Pokemon Anime and Its Western Release
articles.author: world today news
articles.excerpt: The Pokemon anime series is reaching its conclusion in the West, with the final part of the Ultimate Journeys Pokemon season set to be released on June 23, 2023. While the anime special arc in Japan has already aired, the Western audience has been eagerly awaiting the series finale. Netflix has confirmed the release date […]
articles.summary:
The Pokemon anime series is reaching its conclusion in the West, with the final part of the Ultimate Journeys Pokemon season set to be released on June 23, 2023. While the anime special arc in Japan has already aired, the Western audience has been eagerly awaiting the series finale.

Netflix has confirmed the release date for the third and final part of the season, although it has currently only been announced for the USA. However, based on previous seasons, it is expected that the release will follow a similar pattern in other Western territories.

articles.title: Rurouni Kenshin Reboot Anime Reveals Half-Year Release Schedule
articles.author: Nicolo Manaloto
articles.excerpt: Promotion for the new Rurouni Kenshin anime keeps on coming, as the series' fifth trailer has just been released. Instead of just another trailer though, the Rurouni Kenshin reboot anime also revealed its half-year release schedule, along with its opening theme.
articles.summary:
Promotion for the new Rurouni Kenshin anime keeps on coming, as the series' fifth trailer has just been released. Instead of just another trailer though, the Rurouni Kenshin reboot anime also revealed its half-year release schedule, along with its opening theme.

Details about the anime were revealed on the show's official website. There, it was confirmed that the show will run for two cours, meaning we now have an idea of the show's official episode count.

Meanwhile, the new trailer also features a preview of its opening theme that's made by two well-known Japanese artists.

articles.title: 10 most cringe anime shows of all time
articles.author: Rohan Jagannath
articles.excerpt: As a medium, anime has always been known for its storytelling. The compelling visuals paired with unique subjects make for some of the most entertaining viewing experiences.
articles.summary:
As a medium, anime has always been known for its storytelling. The compelling visuals paired with unique subjects make for some of the most entertaining viewing experiences. Today, anime has become a mainstream TV genre and has made it to the big screens even in the West. Titles such as Paprika have even inspired certain events that take place in some of the biggest Hollywood movies like Inception.

Thus, it's safe to say that this medium has come up with some of the best stories one can experience.

Estos últimos años han sido espectaculares para el género Shonen en el anime, pues se muchas obras han sido adaptadas, como 
Chainsaw Man, Jujutsu Kaisen, Demon Slayer

Dragon Ball
El último episodio de Dragon Ball Super se estrenó hace ya unos cinco años, 
concluyendo el arco del Torneo de Poder
, en el que todos los universos estaban en riesgo de ser eliminados y con el Android 17 salvando el día.

articles.title: Netflix sets sail with One Piece in a new trailer
articles.author: Devin Nealy
articles.excerpt: For years, Netflix has labored under the belief that there's buried treasure contained within live-action anime adaptations. It's played the long game with live-action anime adaptations…
articles.summary:
For years, Netflix has labored under the belief that there's buried treasure contained within live-action anime adaptations. It's played the long game with live-action anime adaptations since the streaming giant began to develop its own in-house production studio. One of Netflix's first significant investments was acquiring the rights to a litany of anime series and producing their own. 
 
And while the idea to become a hub for anime series helped expand Netflix's content profile, allowing them to cement their position as the premier streaming service, the company's various attempts at creating live-action versions of classic animes haven't been as successful.

articles.title: eigoMANGA Heads To Anime Expo 2023
articles.author: First Comics News
articles.excerpt: (San Jose, California) – June 20, 2023: Comic book publisher, eigoMANGA announces its participation at North America's largest event for Japanese pop culture
articles.summary:
(San Jose, California) – June 20, 2023: Comic book publisher, eigoMANGA announces its participation at North America's largest event for Japanese pop culture, Anime Expo 2023. Anime Expo 2023 is on July 1–4, 2023 at the Los Angeles Anime Convention in Los Angeles, CA.


eigoMANGA will exhibit at Anime Expo 2023 and host a series of panels that showcase their latest production of comics, animation, games, and mobile apps.


First, eigoMANGA will be previewing upcoming releases, offering convention exclusives, and connecting with fans at their industry booth (#817) in the Exhibit Hall.

articles.title: El anime de Genshin Impact tendrá mejor animación que Kimetsu no Yaiba, según un insider
articles.author: Cristian M. Villa
articles.excerpt: Uno de los insiders más conocidos de la industria del anime asegura que ufotable está preparando un show tremendo
articles.summary: Fue durante el mes de septiembre de 2022 que saltó una noticia que dio la vuelta al mundo en cuestión de minutos: Genshin Impact, uno de los videojuegos más exitosos de estos últimos años, iba a contar ni más ni menos que con su propio anime. No solo eso, sino que el estudio que iba a trabajar en el mismo iba a ser ufotable, el que ha hecho de " Kimetsu no Yaiba" algo más que una experiencia audiovisual. Ahora, un insider ha querido echar carbón al tren del hype asegurando que se viene un show abrumador.

articles.title: Demon Slayer season 3 finale's anime original scenes make it better than the manga
articles.author: Rohan Jagannath
articles.excerpt: Demon Slayer season 3 has finally ended, and fans across the globe thoroughly enjoyed the finale. The series released a one-hour special episode as a finale with plenty of interesting scenes.
articles.summary:
Demon Slayer season 3 has finally ended, and fans across the globe thoroughly enjoyed the finale. The series released a one-hour special episode as a finale with plenty of interesting scenes. One thing that the Demon Slayer series is popular for is its faithful adaptation of the manga.

The series is seasonal and has never produced any filler episodes, leading to good pacing and thoroughly enjoyable storytelling. The manga and anime will have little to no differences in their content.

However, one cannot say the same about the season 3 finale, which introduced a few anime-original scenes, and the fans were all for it.

articles.title: Bleach: Thousand-Year Blood War Part 2 pre-screening hype shatters the internet
articles.author: Gokul Chettiyar
articles.excerpt: With Bleach: Thousand-Year Blood War Part 2 - The Separation set to release on Saturday, July 8, 2023, fans of the anime are very excited.
articles.summary:
With Bleach: Thousand-Year Blood War Part 2 - The Separation set to release on Saturday, July 8, 2023, fans of the anime are very excited. However, some fans will get to experience the first two episodes of the anime sooner due to a pre-screening that is set to take place on June 25.

Bleach: Thousand-Year Blood War sees the Father of the Quincy Yhwach return from his long slumber. He attacks the Soul Society in hopes of stealing the Gotei 13's bankai. During this battle, Yhwach hints to Ichigo about his mysterious descent, which prompts him to find out more about himself.

articles.title: Demon Slayer season 3 finale: Manga vs Anime comparison
articles.author: Sahadat Hossain
articles.excerpt: The Demon Slayer season 3 finale, titled The Connected Bonds: Daybreak and First Light, was released on June 18, 2023.
articles.summary:
The Demon Slayer season 3 finale, titled The Connected Bonds: Daybreak and First Light, was released on June 8, 2023. It captivated viewers' attention around the world with its visualization and storytelling to wrap up the season. Though the episode is based on the story of the Demon Slayer manga, there is some contrast between manga and anime.

The Demon Slayer season 3 finale has artistically adapted the story from the manga and also improvised and added some scenes. This made the animation and story better and synchronized perfectly.

articles.title: Estrenos anime: estas son las series más esperadas de este 2023
articles.author: Redacción La Patria
articles.excerpt: Este año viene cargado de estrenos de anime que no te puedes perder, como la tercera temporada de "Kimetsu no Yaiba" y nuevas entregas de series como "Tokyo Revengers", "Spy x Family", "Shingeki no…
articles.summary:
Este año viene cargado de estrenos de anime que no te puedes perder, como la tercera temporada de "Kimetsu no Yaiba" y nuevas entregas de series como "Tokyo Revengers", "Spy x Family", "Shingeki no Kyojin" y "Jujutsu Kaisen". 
 
El 2022 fue un gran año para los estrenos de anime y este 2023 no se queda atrás. Uno de los más esperados es la tercera temporada de «Kimetsu no Yaiba», que conecta el arco del Distrito Rojo con el de la Villa de los Herreros.


Además, habrá nuevas entregas de series como «Tokyo Revengers», «Spy x Family», «Shingeki no Kyojin» y «Jujutsu Kaisen».

articles.title: This Canceled Anime Got a Second Seasons Thanks to Toonami
articles.author: Kevin T. Rodriguez
articles.excerpt: There was an anime in Japan that was a flop. In America, it was successful enough for Cartoon Network to order a second season.
articles.summary: Cartoon Network's Toonami block is not only the block that helped make anime mainstream, it is also the block known for bringing back canceled anime. After re-runs of Dragon Ball Z became a hit, Toonami reversed their decision to not fund new productions and hired Funimation to produce more English episodes of the hit series. After the final 17 episodes of the DiC Productions dub of Sailor Moon aired, Cartoon Network paid to have Sailor Moon S and Sailor Moon SuperS dubbed (though it was decided it was in everyone's best interest to not dub the final season, Sailor Stars).

articles.title: 7 Best Strategy Anime Games, Ranked
articles.author: Via Erhard
articles.excerpt: Strategy games are a great choice for players that want to think critically, and these are the best anime strategy games to choose from.
articles.summary:
Anime games
 are not only visually stunning and entertaining but can be just as challenging as any other sci-fi or fantasy-inspired 
strategy video games
. JRPGs transport their players to uniquely designed worlds and immerse them in complex stories about warriors, monsters, gigantic robots, and all kinds of fascinating beings that were inspired by anime.
 
Anime fans can get to know new worlds and characters but can also explore the worlds of some of their favorite animes while stepping into the shoes of their favorite characters to defeat enemies.

articles.title: Nier: Automata anime annouces return with a 2-hour long episode
articles.author: Joseph Brogan
articles.excerpt: One of the biggest surprise hits of Winter 2023 anime season was the premiere of Nier: Automata Ver1.1a anime series, which is an adaptation of the video game series of the same name.
articles.summary:
One of the biggest surprise hits of Winter 2023 anime season was the premiere of Nier: Automata Ver.a anime series, which is an adaptation of the video game series of the same name. While there wasn't any negative sentiments heading into the series' premiere, fans were not enthusiastic about the quality.

However, over the course of two months and eight episodes, the Nier: Automata anime series proved itself as enjoyable and high quality as anything else premiering during that anime season. The only thing fans panned was the decision to stop the first season with eight episodes.

articles.title: Pro dan Cons Anime 'Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Swordsmith Village Arc'
articles.author: Z Creators
articles.excerpt: Review anime Demon Slayer Kimetsu no Yaiba Swordsmith Village Arc dari sisi bagus dan buruknya
articles.summary:
INDOZONE.ID - 
Anime 
'Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba' musim ketiga akhirnya dirilis. Musim terbaru ini menceritakan petualangan Tanjiro Kamado di desa penempa pedang. Lagi-lagi, Tanjiro harus menghadapi para iblis tingkat atas.
 
Sekadar menyegarkan ingatan, Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba merupakan adaptasi anime dari manga yang ditulis oleh Koyoharu Gotouge. Manga ini pertama kali dirilis di majalah Weekly Shonen Jump pada bulan Februari 2016. Setelah versi anime-nya tayang perdana pada tanggal 6 April 2019, Demon Slayer berhasil mencapai popularitas yang luar biasa.

articles.summary: What if your horrible work environment was shattered thanks to a zombie apocalypse? That's the question that arises in the upcoming anime series, Zom 100: Bucket List of The Dead. With the anime series arriving on both Hulu and Netflix this summer on July 9th, the undead series is also planning to unleash an English Dub to anime fans. Before Akira Tendo's wild story unfolds, the series has revealed a new trailer that gives viewers a look at the performers for the English Dub iteration of the show.

articles.title: NieR: Automata Ver1.1a Anime Episodes 9 to 12 Will Air At Once on July 23: Everything We Know
articles.author: Britney
articles.excerpt: NieR: Automata Ver1.1a anime series faced broken releases due to the impact of Covid-19 on the production team. But the wait is over, as the official website
articles.summary:
NieR: Automata Ver1.1a 
anime
 series faced broken releases due to the impact of Covid-19 on the production team. But the wait is over, as the official website for the series announced that episodes 9 to 12 will air all at once on July 23; the episodes were originally scheduled for a March release.


Local Japanese networks such as Tokyo MX, Tochigi TV, and BS11 will air the episodes on July 23, and international fans can tune into Crunchyroll, which streams the series as it airs.


In this day and age, few video 
games
 have entertained players quite like NieR: Automata has.

articles.title: 10 Largest Anime Mechs Of All Time
articles.author: Marcel Green
articles.excerpt: The biggest, baddest mechas in all of anime.
articles.summary:
Giant mechs are a staple of anime, with the 
largest mechs in anime history
 often leaving a proportional impact on the medium. More so than most other mediums, mechs are an important part of anime history. With foundational series like 
Tetsujin 28-go 
(or 
Gigantor 
as it's known in the U.S.) and 
Gundam
 establishing some of the medium's most important tropes and elements, it's left a great deal of room for series like 
Neon Genesis Evangelion
 and 
Eureka 7 
to redefine what's possible in mech anime.

articles.author: Rohan Jagannath
articles.excerpt: Chainsaw Man season 2 is likely in the production stage as per @MangaEarlyBird, a leaker on Twitter. As per their statement, Chainsaw Man season 2 and a movie are currently in the making.
articles.summary:
Chainsaw Man season 2 is likely in the production stage as per @MangaEarlyBird, a leaker on Twitter. As per their statement, Chainsaw Man season 2 and a movie are currently in the making. However, it is extremely important to note that this piece of information has not been confirmed by official sources i.e. MAPPA or the official Twitter page of the anime and manga series.

This information has caused quite a stir on the internet as fans are elated to receive news regarding the continuation of their favorite anime series.

articles.title: Anime Expo 2023 Getting Dragon Ball Funko Pop! Exclusives from Hot Topic
articles.author: John Nguyen
articles.summary: Anime Expo 2023 is quickly around the corner, and it'll be headed to the Los Angeles Convention Center on July 1-4. With the anime convention growing and growing, it's become a hot spot for everything anime related. This includes exclusive merchandise headed to the show floor. Today, Hot Topic, the chain featuring music, entertainment, and pop culture merchandise, announced that it will have an Anime Expo 2023 exclusive with the Funko Pop! Animation Dragon Ball Goku & Krillin Vinyl Figure 2-Pack.

articles.excerpt: Koei Tecmo will celebrate the premiere of the Atelier Ryza anime with a special live program on July 1 at 8:00 a.m. EDT.
articles.summary:
Koei Tecmo and Liden Films announced another 
Atelier Ryza
 Anime
 Special Program live stream is set for Saturday, July 1 at 5:00 a.m. PDT / 8:00 a.m. EDT. The live stream will air just a few hours before the premiere of the 
Atelier Ryza
 anime that same day. 


The third live broadcast for the 
Atelier Ryza
 anime will feature voice cast members as they present new information moments before the premiere. These voice cast members include Yuri Noguchi (Reisalin Stout), Yui Kondou (Tao Mongarten), Hitomi Owada (Klaudia Valentz), and Haruka Terui (Lila Decyrus).

articles.title: Black Clover: Sword of the Wizard King Is the Comeback the Anime Deserved
articles.author: Nick Valdez
articles.excerpt: Black Clover made its big comeback to the world of anime with the franchise's very first movie [...]
articles.summary: Black Clover made its big comeback to the world of anime with the franchise's very first movie debuting around the world on Netflix, and Black Clover: Sword of the Wizard King is definitely the comeback fans of the anime deserved. Yuki Tabata's original Black Clover manga is now in the midst of its final arc with the latest chapters being released in the pages of Shueisha's Weekly Shonen Jump magazine, but it's a much different story for the anime. The Black Clover TV series ended its run with 170 episodes under its belt and nearly four years worth of episodes.

articles.title: Cowboy Bebop Announces 25th Anniversary Event
articles.author: Evan Valentine
articles.excerpt: Cowboy Bebop is considered by many anime fans to be the cream of the crop. Focusing on the story [...]
articles.summary:
Cowboy Bebop is considered by many anime fans to be the cream of the crop. Focusing on the story of the bounty hunters aboard the Bebop, the anime series has long been a legendary part of the medium. While the recent live-action adaptation from Netflix failed to garner a second season to wrap up its story, the franchise remains one of the most beloved when it comes to the anime world and is preparing to celebrate its twenty-fifth anniversary with a brand new exhibit in Japan.

Cowboy Bebop has never seen a sequel series, or spin-off revealed following the manga's original conclusion in 1998, and for good reason.

articles.title: Best Anime Of The Spring 2023 Season: From The Witch From Mercury To Oshi No Ko
articles.author: Rafael Motamayor
articles.excerpt: Let /Film be your guide to the best anime of the spring 2023 season.
articles.summary:
(Welcome to
 
I Didn't Know What Seasonal Anime to Watch, So I Asked /Film for Help and They Gave Me a List,
 
a regular column dedicated to helping choose what anime shows to watch each season.)


And so, another season of anime has ended. While 
the winter season wasn't necessarily full of bangers,
 it still delivered the goods. That being said, spring 2023 more than made up for it. It gave us two all-time great seasons, including one of the best seasons of TV ever made. If that wasn't enough, there were still plenty of fun returning shows, thrilling adaptations, and stellar comedies.

articles.title: 10 Groundbreaking Anime Series That Aged Well
articles.author: Daniel Kurland
articles.excerpt: From Attack on Titan to Serial Experiments Lain, some anime series are so avant-garde that they seem doomed to fail but stand the test of time anyway.
articles.summary:
Anime
 is one of the most limitless storytelling mediums, and it's truly impressive to look at the many formative series that fill it. Each new year introduces plenty of ambitious and inventive anime, but it's sometimes difficult to tell if a modern classic will last the test of time or if it's the subject of some variety of recent bias.
 
There are decades of compelling anime content to pull from, many of which are series that are even more popular today than when they first made their debuts. Audiences who are interested in evergreen anime hits that are never going to go out of fashion should look no further than these groundbreaking series that have only gotten better with age.

articles.author: Joseph Brogan
articles.excerpt: The final episode for Vinland Saga season 2 aired on Monday, June 19, 2023, bringing to a close what many are calling one of the greatest seasons of anime of all time.
articles.summary:
The final episode for Vinland Saga season 2 aired on Monday, June 19, 2023, bringing to a close what many are calling one of the greatest seasons of anime of all time. Thorfinn's journey throughout both the entire first season and everything in the second season leading up to the finale all come together in a neat, emotional package that looks to the future.

Likewise, Vinland Saga fans are now curious about the anime's future and wonder when the next season will be released. Many have been considering the eventual arrival of the third season a foregone conclusion long before the second season's finale.

articles.title: 10 Best Pokémon Anime Series, Ranked
articles.author: Pokémon
articles.excerpt: As Ash Ketchum exits the Pokémon franchise, another of its series draws to a close. How do the various Pokémon anime stack up against each other?
articles.summary:
Now that Ash Ketchum's Pokémon journey is officially over, there's never been a better time to look back at the anime and rank the best Pokémon series. The Pokémon anime has evolved a lot over the years, both in the main series featuring Ash and in the various side projects that have been animated. It's gone from adventure to action to comedy and back again, but fans stuck with it throughout it all. That's not to say there haven't been some fan favorites, of course.
Though each season and series brings something new to the world of Pokémon, some stories naturally stood out more than others.

articles.title: 10 Best Ninja Anime, Ranked
articles.author: George Voutiritsas
articles.excerpt: Action-packed series set in a ninja world like Naruto and Basilisk are some of the most popular stories in anime.
articles.summary:
Anime has seen a surge in popularity in recent years because more and more people now view it as a valid entertainment medium. Anime covers every type of genre imaginable, but action is still the most popular, and a number of action anime feature ninjas. Most ninja anime are set in feudal Japan, but there are a few that take place in more modern settings.
 
Ninjas have a certain mystique around them, because they are highly skilled assassins who hide in the shadows. Ninja anime have taken advantage of this mystique, which is why most series have detailed and epic fight sequences.

Original Robot Anime Miru Announced by Agricultural Firm
 
 
 
 by 
 
 
 June 20, 2023 
 
 
 
There's a new original robot anime on the way, and it's being produced by an atypical source: Yanmar, a manufacturer of agricultural machines.


Says Yanmar:


Miru explores the theme of 'confrontation and harmony between humans and nature' in the context of a global movement towards a sustainable society. The protagonist will navigate challenges and personal growth, striving to preserve the environment required for our existence, while the presence of robots will be depicted alongside their journey.

articles.summary:
Todos los temas de apertura de Shingeki no Kyojin.
Los temas de apertura en las series de anime se han vuelto una parte sumamente 
representativa e icónica de este género de la animación
, que se encuentra presente en la gran mayoría de los anime, y que, por lo general, ha logrado marcar al fandom de ciertas series de una u otra forma.
Actualmente, los openings se han convertido 
uno de los aspectos más emblemáticos y resaltantes
 de las series de animación japonesa, incluso llegando a formar parte de las listas de reproducción de los fans.
